voiceStateUpdate.leftWhenIdle: I have left the channel and deleted the queue

help.description: Shows a list of the bot's commands, or help for one
help.nonPrivileged: {{messageAuthor}}, you do not have privileges to view this command

helpEmbed.notation:
- Square brackets: _[optional argument]_
- Angle brackets: _<mandatory argument>_
- Braces: _{default argument}_
- Parentheses: _(miscellaneous information)_
 - Double quotes: _"literal text argument"_
- Vertical bar: _chance1 | chance2_

commandListEmbed.author: List of {{botUsername}} commands
commandListEmbed.footer: To learn how to use a command, type: {{prefix}}help <command name>

ping.description: Provides information about the state of the bot

stats.description: Shows your or another member's XP stats
stats.unknownMember: Member not found. You must mention a member or enter it's ID

xp.invalidMember: You have not provided a valid member
xp.invalidQuantity: You must provide a valid quantity
xp.unauthorizedModify: You cannot modify the XP of a member with a role equal to or higher than yours

loggingEmbed.title: Logging - [XP SYSTEM]
loggingEmbed.description: The XP amount of **{{memberTag}}** has changed

xp.notificationEmbed: The XP amount of **{{memberTag}}** has changed

ban.userNotFound:
User not found. You must mention a member or write it's ID.
If the user is not on the server, you must specify it's ID
ban.badHierarchy: You cannot ban a member with a role equal to or higher than yours
ban.alreadyBanned: This user has already been banned

notificationEmbed.withReason: **{{userTag}}** got banned due to __{{reason}}__, anyone else?

infractions.description: Displays a list of a member's infractions and their respective IDs
infractions.nonPrivileged: {{messageAuthor}}, you do not have privileges to perform this operation
infractions.noBots: You cannot get information from a bot

infractionsEmbed.title: Infractions
infractionsEmbed.description:
Displaying infractions for member **{{member}}**.
Current sanction: {{sanction}}

kick.memberNotFound: Member not found. You must mention a member or enter it's ID
kick.badHierarchy: You cannot kick a member with a role equal to or higher than yours

notificationEmbed.withReason: **{{memberTag}}** has been kicked due to __{{reason}}__, anyone else?

mute.description: Mutes a member from text and voice channels
mute.memberNotFound: Member not found. You must mention a member or enter it's ID
mute.badHierarchy: You cannot mute a member with a role equal to or higher than yours

notificationEmbed.withReason: **{{memberTag}}** has been muted due to __{{reason}}__, anyone else?

rmwarn.description: To remove one (or all) warnings of a member
rmwarn.memberNotFound: Member not found. You must mention a member or enter it's ID
rmwarn.badHierarchy: You cannot remove a warning from a member with a role equal to or higher than yours
rmwarn.cantRemoveAny: You can't remove warnings you haven't done

loggingEmbedAll.title: Logging - [INFRACTIONS]
loggingEmbedAll.description: All warnings on a member have been removed

privateEmbedAll.author: [UN-WARNED]
privateEmbedAll.description: {{member}}, all your warnings have been removed

notificationEmbedAll.title: Operation completed
notificationEmbedAll.description: All warnings of member **{{member}}** have been removed

enabledNotificationEmbed.title: Operation completed
enabledNotificationEmbed.description: Slow mode has been activated with a delay of `{{seconds}}s`

notificationEmbed.withReason: **{{userTag}}** got banned due to __{{reason}}__, anyone else?

tempmute.badHierarchy: You cannot mute a member with a role equal to or higher than yours

unban.userNotFound:
User not found. You must mention a member or write it's ID.
If the user is not on the server, you must specify it's ID
unban.notBanned: This user has not been banned

unmute.memberNotFound: Member not found. You must mention a member or enter it's ID
unmute.badHierarchy: {{messageAuthor}}, you cannot un-mute someone with a role equal to or higher than yours
unmute.cantRemoveAny: {{messageAuthor}}, you can't unmute someone you haven't muted yourself

warn.description: Adds a warning to a member
warn.memberNotFound: Member not found. You must mention a member or enter it's ID
warn.badHierarchy: You cannot warn a member with a role equal to or higher than yours
warn.cooldown: You have to wait before you can put a new warning on {{member}}

clear.noQueue: There are no items in the queue

forward.description: Moves a track forward by a specified amount of time
forward.cantAdjustLive: You cannot adjust the timing of a live broadcast

join.description: Connects the bot to your voice channel

leave.description: Makes the bot leave the voice channel

loop.description: Enables loop mode for the current track
loop.enabled: I have enabled the loop mode on the current track
loop.disabled: I have disabled the loop mode on the current track

loopqueue.description: Enables the loop mode for the reproduction queue
loopqueue.enabled: I have enabled the loop mode on the queue
loopqueue.disabled: I have disabled the loop mode on the queue

move.description: Modifies the position of a track in the queue
move.notInteger: You must provide an integer number
move.belowOne: You want to play dirty huh...
move.movedTrack: I have moved the track on the queue

nowplaying.description: Shows information about the current track

pause.abandonOnIdle: I have abandoned the channel and cleared the queue

play.description: Searchs for a track or playlist by name or YouTube URL. If you don't provide parameters, resumes queue
play.unavailable: The player is running on another channel

playskip.description: Searchs for a track or playlist by name or YouTube URL and skips the current track

queue.description: Shows the tracks that are in the queue

remove.description: Removes a track from the reproduction queue
remove.allDeleted: I have deleted all tracks from the queue
remove.nonInt: You must provide an integer number
remove.belowOne: You want to play dirty huh...
remove.doesntExist: Track #`{{number}}` is not added to the queue

replay.description: Plays the current track from the beginning

rewind.description: Moves back the moment of a track by a certain amount of time
rewind.cantAdjustLive: You cannot adjust the timing of a live stream
rewind.cantRweindMore: You cannot specify a time before `00:00:00`

seek.description: Changes the track time to a specific timestamp
seek.cantAdjustLive: You cannot adjust the timing of a live stream
seek.cantAdjustFiles: Cannot modify local files playback point

shuffle.description: Enables shuffle mode in the reproduction queue

skip.description: Skips the current track or a specified amount
skip.cantSkipOnRandom: You cannot skip more than one track with shuffle mode enabled
skip.cantMultipleOnLoop: You cannot skip more than one track with loop mode enabled
skip.notInteger: You must provide an integer number
skip.belowOne: You want to play dirty huh...

sound.description: Plays a .mp3 file from the `media/audios` folder or shows a list of them

soundListEmbed.title: List of audios
soundListEmbed.footer: To listen an audio, type: {{prefix}}sound <audio name>

sound.alreadyPlaying: The player is running on another channel

embed.author: Permanent invite
embed.footer: This link never expires and has unlimited uses

poll.description: Starts an interactive wizard to create a poll or ends an ongoing one
poll.unknownPoll: Poll with ID {{id}} does not exist
poll.deletedPoll: The poll with ID {{id}} no longer exists, so it has been deleted from the database
poll.onlyYours: You can only end your own polls

endedPollEmbed.title: Operation completed
endedPollEmbed.description: The poll "__{{poll}}__" will end shortly on channel {{pollChannel}}

titleEmbed.title: Title
titleEmbed.description: Provide a title for the poll

durationEmbed.title: Duration
durationEmbed.description:
Provide a duration. For example: `1d 2h 3m 4s`.
Enter `-` for no end

poll.invalidDuration: You must provide a unit of time measurement. For example: `5d 10h 2m`

purge.description: Deletes a certain number of messages in a channel (as long as they are less than 14 days old)
purge.quantityNotProvided: You must provide the number of messages to delete
purge.wrongQuantity: You must provide a numerical quantity equal to or greater than 1, and less than 100
purge.invalidChannel: The supplied text channel is invalid
purge.noPermission: You do not have permission to manage messages on {{channel}}
purge.noMessages: Could not find any messages on {{channel}}
purge.expiredMessages: Only messages older than `14 days` can be deleted

run.description: Runs one of the preprogrammed scripts (see the wiki section "[Preprogrammed scripts](https://github.com/EasyXploit/HelpBot/wiki/preprogrammed-scripts)")

welcome.memberNotProvided: You have not provided a member
welcome.invalidMember: You have not provided a valid member

goodbye.memberNotProvided: You have not provided a member
goodbye.invalidMember: You have not provided a valid member

run.invalidCommand: You did not specify a valid command

send.description: The bot will send a message to the current text channel, with or without embedded formatting

userinfo.description: Displays information about you or any other member
userinfo.invalidMember: You have not provided a valid member
userinfo.cantSeeAny: You do not have privileges to see other members information

loadEmojis.maxExceeded: No more than 50 emojis can be loaded

newGuild.title: {{botUsername}} added successfully!
newGuild.description:
Use the configuration files to adjust the bot to your liking.
Use the `{{prefix}}help` command to see the commands.
Remember that the bot will only be able to moderate those people who have a role below the role created by {{botUser}}.
If you need help, you can [check the wiki](https://github.com/EasyXploit/HelpBot/wiki/Configuration)
